title: A Commuter's Delight! Studio Apartment AVL 8/5 Cal9
posting_body: ['Studio w/ New Kitchen and Bathroom CAL9', 'Property Address', '2140 California Street | Apt 9 | Concord, CA 94520', 'Available: 08/05/2022', 'Offered By', '2140 Cal LP', 'Description', 'This well lit top floor studio is just 5 minutes from todos santos park, Concord BART, and just 10 minutes from DVC campus.', 'This building is a commuters delight, close to:', '- DVC', '- BART', '- Todos Santos (farmers market, concerts, etc!)', '- Brenden Theaters', '- Waterworld', '- Park n Shop Mall', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Bedrooms: 0 Bed', 'Bathrooms: 1 Bath', 'Parking: Garage (See Details Below)', 'Lease Duration: 12 months', 'Pets Policy: Pets Under 80 lbs Welcome (See Details Below)', 'Laundry: Shared, Coin Operated', 'Floor: 1st (not ground level)', 'Property Type: Apartment', '***Photos of a similar unit***', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Gas Range', 'Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Microwave', 'Cable-ready', 'Intercom system', 'Hardwood floor', 'Tile floor', 'Granite countertop', 'BUILDING FEATURES', 'Controlled access', 'On-street parking', 'Carport -- Attached', 'ADDITIONAL COSTS:', 'Pet: $35-50 added to the base month per pet', 'Water, Garbage and 1 parking space included', 'Security Deposit: Dependent on income.', "1.5-2x first month's rent.", 'Smoking is not permitted on the premises.', 'Contact info:', 'show contact info', 'Professionally Managed by:', 'Kasa Operations LLC', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 400', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $1,725.00', 'Available: 08/05/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $3,450.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed', 'schedule a tour at your convenience here: <URL>']
